lines.text:
[to Garrett]
You get engaged to my daughter, and all you can think about is capital punishment?

[about Garrett]
How much do you know about that guy?
He's the best score I've made in a long time.

[about Garrett]
This guy's got a lot of class.
Yeah? If he's got so much class, what's he doin' with you?

[to Spencer]
It's a weird, crazy idea, but that's the reason it intrigues me.
Nothing about this case will be dead until Garrett is executed.
Well, could I get in touch with you?
